title: Catalina Mac OS X & League of Legends
body:
Hi there.
I just wanted to ask riot if they are going to make their game available to people who use mac once more? or even..contact apple to see if they can get their game supported?
I'm not sure how it works I just miss playing league of legends, I've tried EVERYTHING in the books to try and make it playable and nothing has worked. 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
